channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on BuLLeKeUp's blog

item.title: Complete NS3 with DCE installation on Ubuntu 16.04 and 17.04
item.description: I recently installed NS3 to benchmark different network applications and protocol implementations such as libcoap. I used different VMs with either Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or Ubuntu 17.04 to run NS3, and since I encountered many difficulties to make all modules successfully build and work, here are some patches to overcome common problems (may not be optimal, take it as a bunch of hints. NOTE: This applies only for NS3 installation via bake.
